technology: There were no extreme technical difficulties, but the participant did have to adjust his camera at one point.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express much negative affect about the pandemic in the present, but he did mention that he was glad that it was mostly over.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed some negative affect about the pandemic when recalling the past, such as when he was living in Chicago and his parents called him to come home because it was not safe to get on a flight.
communal_orientation: The participant was generally kind and engaged in the conversation, but he did not go out of his way to show concern or sympathy for his partner's needs.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and genuinely conversed with his partner, trying to keep the conversation going.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying his beliefs/perspective.

questions.transcript: Were you living at the at the time when kind of the pandemic hit?

vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are very important, as he stated that he was thankful for the vaccine for allowing us to return to normal as much as possible.
booster_importance: The participant believes that boosters are very important, as he stated that he got a booster just to protect himself further.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity, as he considered different ideas and perspectives in the conversation.
general_notes: The participant is very talkative and seems to enjoy sharing his experiences.
